instructions.name: createPool
docs: Create a new pool for borrowing and lending

accounts.name: marginPool
docs: The pool to be created

accounts.name: vault
docs: The token account holding the pool's deposited funds

accounts.name: depositNoteMint
docs: The mint for deposit notes

accounts.name: loanNoteMint
docs: The mint for loan notes

accounts.name: tokenMint
docs: The mint for the token being custodied by the pool

accounts.name: authority
docs: The authority to create pools, which must sign

accounts.name: payer
docs: The payer of rent for new accounts

instructions.name: configure
docs: Configure an existing pool

accounts.name: marginPool
docs: The pool to be configured

accounts.name: authority
docs: The authority allowed to modify the pool, which must sign

instructions.name: collect
docs: Accrue interest on the pool, and collect any fees.

accounts.name: marginPool
docs: The pool to be refreshed

accounts.name: vault
docs: The vault for the pool, where tokens are held

accounts.name: feeDestination
docs: The account to deposit the collected fees

accounts.name: depositNoteMint
docs: The mint for the deposit notes

instructions.name: deposit
docs: Deposit tokens into the pool in exchange for notes

accounts.name: marginPool
docs: The pool to deposit into

accounts.name: vault
docs: The vault for the pool, where tokens are held

accounts.name: depositNoteMint
docs: The mint for the deposit notes

accounts.name: depositor
docs: The address with authority to deposit the tokens

accounts.name: source
docs: The source of the tokens to be deposited

accounts.name: destination
docs: The destination of the deposit notes

instructions.name: withdraw
docs: Withdraw tokens from the pool, exchanging in previously received
deposit notes.

accounts.name: depositor
docs: The address with authority to withdraw the deposit

accounts.name: marginPool
docs: The pool to withdraw from

accounts.name: vault
docs: The vault for the pool, where tokens are held

accounts.name: depositNoteMint
docs: The mint for the deposit notes

accounts.name: source
docs: The source of the deposit notes to be redeemed

accounts.name: destination
docs: The destination of the tokens withdrawn

instructions.name: marginBorrow
docs: Borrow tokens using a margin account

accounts.name: marginAccount
docs: The margin account being executed on

accounts.name: marginPool
docs: The pool to borrow from

accounts.name: loanNoteMint
docs: The mint for the notes representing loans from the pool

accounts.name: depositNoteMint
docs: The mint for the notes representing deposit into the pool

accounts.name: loanAccount
docs: The account to receive the loan notes

accounts.name: depositAccount
docs: The account to receive the borrowed tokens (as deposit notes)

instructions.name: marginRepay
docs: Repay a loan with a maximum amount.
If the loan balance is lower than the amount, the excess is left in the
deposit account.

accounts.name: marginAccount
docs: The margin account being executed on

accounts.name: marginPool
docs: The pool with the outstanding loan

accounts.name: loanNoteMint
docs: The mint for the notes representing loans from the pool

accounts.name: depositNoteMint
docs: The mint for the notes representing deposit into the pool

accounts.name: loanAccount
docs: The account with the loan notes

accounts.name: depositAccount
docs: The account with the deposit to pay off the loan with

instructions.name: repay
docs: Repay a margin account debt from an outside token account

accounts.name: marginPool
docs: The pool with the outstanding loan

accounts.name: loanNoteMint
docs: The mint for the notes representing loans from the pool

accounts.name: vault
docs: The vault responsible for storing the pool's tokens

accounts.name: loanAccount
docs: The account with the loan notes

accounts.name: repaymentTokenAccount
docs: The token account repaying the debt

accounts.name: repaymentAccountAuthority
docs: Signing authority for the repaying token account

instructions.name: marginRefreshPosition
docs: Update the pool position on a margin account

accounts.name: marginAccount
docs: The margin account being executed on

accounts.name: marginPool
docs: The pool to be refreshed

accounts.name: tokenPriceOracle
docs: The pyth price account for the pool's token

instructions.name: registerLoan
docs: Creates the token account to track the loan notes,
then requests margin to register the position

accounts.name: positionTokenMetadata
docs: This will be required for margin to register the position,
so requiring it here makes it easier for clients to ensure
that it will be sent.

accounts.name: loanNoteAccount
docs: The token account to store the loan notes representing the claim
against the margin account

accounts.name: loanNoteMint
docs: The mint for the notes representing loans from the pool

instructions.name: closeLoan
docs: Closes a previously opened loan token account

accounts.name: loanNoteAccount
docs: The token account to store the loan notes representing the claim
against the margin account

accounts.name: loanNoteMint
docs: The mint for the notes representing loans from the pool

instructions.name: adminTransferLoan
docs: Administrative function for moving loans between accounts

accounts.name: authority
docs: The administrative authority

accounts.name: marginPool
docs: The margin pool with the loan

accounts.name: sourceLoanAccount
docs: The loan account to be moved from

accounts.name: targetLoanAccount
docs: The loan account to be moved into

accounts.name: MarginPool
docs: Account containing information about a margin pool, which
services lending/borrowing operations.

fields.name: poolBump
docs: The bump seed used to create the pool address

fields.name: vault
docs: The address of the vault account, which has custody of the
pool's tokens

fields.name: feeDestination
docs: The address of the account to deposit collected fees, represented as
deposit notes

fields.name: depositNoteMint
docs: The address of the mint for deposit notes

fields.name: loanNoteMint
docs: The address of the mint for the loan notes

fields.name: tokenMint
docs: The token the pool allows lending and borrowing on

fields.name: tokenPriceOracle
docs: The address of the pyth oracle with price information for the token

fields.name: address
docs: The address of this pool

fields.name: config
docs: The configuration of the pool

fields.name: borrowedTokens
docs: The total amount of tokens borrowed, that need to be repaid to
the pool.

fields.name: uncollectedFees
docs: The total amount of tokens in the pool that's reserved for collection
as fees.

fields.name: depositTokens
docs: The total amount of tokens available in the pool's vault

fields.name: depositNotes
docs: The total amount of notes issued to depositors of tokens.

fields.name: loanNotes
docs: The total amount of notes issued to borrowers of tokens

fields.name: accruedUntil
docs: The time the interest was last accrued up to

types.name: MarginPoolSummary
docs: Common fields from MarginPool for event logging.

types.name: MarginPoolConfig
docs: Configuration for a margin pool

fields.name: flags
docs: Space for binary settings

fields.name: utilizationRate1
docs: The utilization rate at which first regime transitions to second

fields.name: utilizationRate2
docs: The utilization rate at which second regime transitions to third

fields.name: borrowRate0
docs: The lowest borrow rate

fields.name: borrowRate1
docs: The borrow rate at the transition point from first to second regime

fields.name: borrowRate2
docs: The borrow rate at the transition point from second to third regime

fields.name: borrowRate3
docs: The highest possible borrow rate.

fields.name: managementFeeRate
docs: The fee rate applied to interest payments collected

fields.name: reserved
docs: Unused

types.name: TokenChange
docs: Interface for changing the token value of an account through pool instructions

fields.name: kind
docs: The kind of change to be applied

fields.name: tokens
docs: The number of tokens applied in the change

types.name: Amount
docs: Represent an amount of some value (like tokens, or notes)

types.name: PoolAction
docs: Represents the primary pool actions, used in determining the
rounding direction between tokens and notes.

types.name: RoundingDirection
docs: Represents the direction in which we should round when converting
between tokens and notes.

errors.name: InterestAccrualBehind
errors.msg: Interest accrual is too far behind

errors.name: DepositsOnly
errors.msg: The pool currently only allows deposits

errors.name: InsufficientLiquidity
errors.msg: The pool does not have sufficient liquidity for the transaction

errors.name: InvalidAmount
errors.msg: An invalid amount has been supplied

errors.name: InvalidSetTo
errors.msg: An invalid `SetTo` value was given for a `TokenChange`
